AT.name: F-ZERO™ X
AT.description: F-Zero X , der spannungsgeladene Nachfolger des Klassikers für das Super Nintendo, ist eines der schnellsten Rennspiele, das du je gesehen hast. Wenn du einer der Schwächlinge warst, dem schon beim Spielen des Originals, F-Zero (jetzt für den Game Boy Advance als F-Zero: Maximum Velocity neu aufgelegt) immer schlecht wurde, dann warte mal, bis du F-Zero X spielst! Ein Grund für das überwältigende Geschwindigkeitsgefühl von F-Zero X ist die durchgehend hohe Bildwiederholrate. Selbst wenn sich 30 Hover-Autos um die Pole-Position bekriegen, gibt es nicht das kleinste Ruckeln. Und der 4-Spieler-Modus mit dem Split-Screen ist wohl einer der heißesten Mehrspielermodi, die es je gab, und auch hier bleibt die Bildrate immer konstant hoch. Unterstützt 4 Spieler. 4 Spieler können gleichzeitig spielen. Wenn du diesen Titel bereits auf deiner Wii™ erworben hast, führe einen System-Transfer von deiner Wii auf deine Wii U™ durch, um ein Upgrade-Sonderangebot zu erhalten. Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

AU.name: F-ZERO™ X
AU.description: A scintillating successor to a Super Nintendo classic, F-Zero X is one of the fastest racers you'll ever clap eyes on. If you were one of the wimps who got queasy from playing the original F-Zero (now updated for Game Boy Advance in F-Zero: Maximum Velocity), wait until you play F-Zero X! Part of the reason F-Zero X plays so well is the game's consistently fast frame rate. Even with 30 hover cars jostling for pole position on-screen, there's never a hint of slow-down. Four-player split screen is perhaps the most addictive multiplayer race ever, again with no sign of syrupy frame rates. Supports 4 players. 4 players can play simultaneously. If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

BG.name: F-ZERO™ X
BG.description: A scintillating successor to a Super Nintendo classic, F-Zero X is one of the fastest racers you'll ever clap eyes on. If you were one of the wimps who got queasy from playing the original F-Zero (now updated for Game Boy Advance in F-Zero: Maximum Velocity), wait until you play F-Zero X! Part of the reason F-Zero X plays so well is the game's consistently fast frame rate. Even with 30 hover cars jostling for pole position on-screen, there's never a hint of slow-down. If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

BE.name: F-ZERO™ X
BE.description: Succédant brillamment à un classique de Super Nintendo, F-Zero X est l'une des courses les plus rapides qu'il vous sera jamais donné de voir. Et si vous étiez l'une ces petites natures qui ont eu le vertige en jouant au premier opus de F-Zero (aujourd'hui actualisé pour Game Boy Advance en F-Zero: Maximum Velocity), attendez de voir F-Zero X ! L'une des raisons pour laquelle F-Zero X est si énorme est sans doute la constante fluidité de ses animations. Et jamais le moindre ralentissement, même quand vous avez 30 vaisseaux à l'écran qui se battent pour la pole position. La course dont vous deviendrez sans doute le plus accro est celle qui vous permet d'opposer quatre joueurs en écran partagé, et ce, toujours sans flottement dans la vitesse de déroulement du film. Supporte jusqu'à 4 joueurs. Jusqu'à 4 joueurs peuvent jouer simultanément. Si vous possédez ce titre sur votre Wii, faites un transfert Wii™ vers votre Wii U™ afin d'obtenir la version améliorée à un prix spécial ! Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

CA.name: F-Zero™ X
CA.description: Choose from 30 different hover-car racers, including updated versions of the Blue Falcon and other vehicles from the original F-Zero, and get ready to play one of the fastest racers ever! Race to the finish line on tracks that twist and turn through the air. However, you will have to avoid the other 29 cars on the track or else face the consequences! If you're in a competitive mood, try to win a Grand Prix Cup, get the fastest lap time in a Time Trial, or destroy the competition in a Death Race. You can also challenge three friends in the Versus mode. With five separate play modes, hidden vehicles and courses, and an excellent sound track, F-Zero X still represents one of the best racing titles to date!

ES.name: F-ZERO™ X
ES.description: F-Zero X, un brillante sucesor de un clásico de Super Nintendo, es uno de los juegos de carreras más rápido que hayas podido ver nunca. Si eres uno de los que se marearon jugando al F-Zero original (actualizado ahora para Game Boy Advance en F-Zero: Maximum Velocity), espera a jugar con F-Zero X. Su alta velocidad de fotogramas constituye uno de los mayores atractivos de F-Zero X. No detectarás ni un ápice de ralentización, incluso con 30 vehículos flotantes luchando por conseguir la mayor puntuación. La pantalla dividida para cuatro jugadores es posiblemente la carrera multijugador más apasionante que hayas podido disfrutar nunca, de nuevo la velocidad de fotogramas no se ve afectada. Soporta 4 jugadores. 4 jugadores pueden jugar simultáneamente. Si posees este título en tu Wii™, puedes realizar una transferencia de datos de Wii a Wii U™ y obtener una actualización a un precio especial. Esta es la versión estadounidense del juego.

IT.name: F-ZERO™ X
IT.description: Figlio formidabile di un mitico classico per Super Nintendo, F-Zero X è il gioco di corse più veloce che possiate vedere. Se siete tra quelli a cui è venuta la nausea a furia di giocare a F-Zero (ora aggiornato per Game Boy Advance con F-Zero: Maximum Velocity), aspettate di provare F-Zero X! Uno dei motivi per cui F-Zero X è così "mitico" sono i tempi di frame velocissimi. Anche con 30 vetture contemporaneamente sullo schermo in lotta per ottenere la pole position, non noterete mai un accenno di rallentamento. Lo schermo condiviso da quattro giocatori rende questa corsa assolutamente intrigante, senza il benché minimo rallentamento nell'azione. Supporta fino a 4 giocatori. È possibile giocare fino a 4 giocatori contemporaneamente. Se possiedi questo titolo sulla tua console Wii™, effettua un trasferimento dati su Wii U™ per potere ottenere la versione ottimizzata a un prezzo speciale! Questa è la versione americana del gioco.

MX.name: F-Zero™ X
MX.description: ¡Elige entre 30 vehículos de carrera flotantes, incluyendo versiones actualizadas del Blue Falcon y otros vehículos de F-Zero original, y prepárate para una de las carreras más rápidas de todos los tiempos! Corre hasta la meta en carriles que tuercen y doblan a través del aire. ¡Pero tienes que evitar a los otros 29 carros en la pista o sufrir las consecuencias! Si te sientes con un estado de ánimo competitivo, intenta ganar la copa Grand Prix, obtener el tiempo de vuelta más rápido en el modo de Prueba de Tiempo, o destruir a la competencia en una Carrera Mortal. También puedes retar a tres amigos en modo Versus. ¡Con cinco modos de juego distintos, vehículos y pistas escondidas, y una música de juego excelente, F-Zero X representa uno de los mejores juegos de carrera de todos los tiempos!

NO.name: F-ZERO™ X
NO.description: A scintillating successor to a Super Nintendo classic, F-Zero X is one of the fastest racers you'll ever clap eyes on. If you were one of the wimps who got queasy from playing the original F-Zero (now updated for Game Boy Advance in F-Zero: Maximum Velocity), wait until you play F-Zero X! Part of the reason F-Zero X plays so well is the game's consistently fast frame rate. Even with 30 hover cars jostling for pole position on-screen, there's never a hint of slow-down. Four-player split screen is perhaps the most addictive multiplayer race ever, again with no sign of syrupy frame rates. Supports 4 players. 4 players can play simultaneously. If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

NL.name: F-ZERO™ X
NL.description: Dit is de flitsende opvolger van een klassieke Super Nintendo-game. F-Zero X is één van de snelste racegames die je ooit onder ogen zult krijgen. Als jij zo'n kneusje was dat al misselijk werd van de originele F-Zero (nu ge-update voor Game Boy Advance in F-Zero: Maximum Velocity), wacht dan maar tot je F-Zero X hebt gespeeld! F-Zero X scheurt onder andere zo lekker omdat de game een constant hoge framerate heeft. Zelfs met dertig hovercars die om pole position knokken, is ie op geen hapering te betrappen. Met vier spelers tegelijk op een scherm zit je misschien wel in de meest onweerstaanbare race aller tijden, en ook nu heb je geen last van stroperige framerates. Ondersteunt 4 spelers. 4 spelers kunnen tegelijkertijd spelen. Als je deze titel hebt gekocht op je Wii™, kom je in aanmerking voor een speciale upgrade-prijs als je je gegevens overzet van Wii naar Wii U™. Dit is de Amerikaanse versie van het spel.

NZ.name: F-ZERO™ X
NZ.description: A scintillating successor to a Super Nintendo classic, F-Zero X is one of the fastest racers you'll ever clap eyes on. If you were one of the wimps who got queasy from playing the original F-Zero (now updated for Game Boy Advance in F-Zero: Maximum Velocity), wait until you play F-Zero X! Part of the reason F-Zero X plays so well is the game's consistently fast frame rate. Even with 30 hover cars jostling for pole position on-screen, there's never a hint of slow-down. Four-player split screen is perhaps the most addictive multiplayer race ever, again with no sign of syrupy frame rates. Supports 4 players. 4 players can play simultaneously. If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

PL.name: F-ZERO™ X
PL.description: A scintillating successor to a Super Nintendo classic, F-Zero X is one of the fastest racers you'll ever clap eyes on. If you were one of the wimps who got queasy from playing the original F-Zero (now updated for Game Boy Advance in F-Zero: Maximum Velocity), wait until you play F-Zero X! Part of the reason F-Zero X plays so well is the game's consistently fast frame rate. Even with 30 hover cars jostling for pole position on-screen, there's never a hint of slow-down. Four-player split screen is perhaps the most addictive multiplayer race ever, again with no sign of syrupy frame rates. Supports 4 players. 4 players can play simultaneously. If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

PT.name: F-ZERO™ X
PT.description: O F-Zero X, um sucessor brilhante de um clássico da Super Nintendo, é um dos jogos de corridas mais rápido que alguma vez irás ver. Se já sofrias de enjoos ao jogar o F-Zero original (agora atualizado para a consola Game Boy Advance com o F-Zero: Maximum Velocity), espera até experimentares o F-Zero X! Parte do motivo do jogo ter uma jogabilidade tão boa, deve-se ao constante e elevado rácio de fotogramas. Mesmo com 30 carros flutuantes a lutarem pelo primeiro lugar no ecrã, não existe abrandamento de imagem. No modo de quatro jogadores com o ecrã dividido, este título torna-se, provavelmente, no mais aliciante jogo de corridas até à data, mantendo uma estabilidade notável. Permite 4 jogadores. 4 jogadores podem jogar simultaneamente. Caso já tenha adquirido este título para a sua Wii, faça uma transferência de dados da sua Wii™ para a sua Wii U™ com atualizações a um preço especial. Esta é a versão do jogo para os EUA.

RU.name: F-ZERO™ X
RU.description: Приготовьтесь к увлекательному продолжению классической игры времен Super Nintendo! F-Zero X — это самые быстрые гонки, в которые вы когда-либо играли. По сравнению с F-Zero X, гонки в игре F-Zero (переизданной для Game Boy Advance под названием F-Zero: Maximum Velocity) это так — цветочки! Высокая частота смены кадров — одна из причин, почему играть в F-Zero X так приятно. Даже когда на экране отображено 30 летающих машин соперников в напряженном соревновании за первое место, игровой процесс останется стабильным и гладким. А в режиме разделенного экрана до четырех игроков вы сможете насладиться самой захватывающей многопользовательской гонкой в мире, все с такой же безупречной частотой смены кадров! Поддерживает 4 игроков. 4 игроков могут играть одновременно. Если вы приобрели игру на Wii™, вы можете передать ее на консоль Wii U™ и получить скидку на обновление игры до версии Wii U. Эта версия игры предназначена для продажи в США.

SE.name: F-ZERO™ X
SE.description: A scintillating successor to a Super Nintendo classic, F-Zero X is one of the fastest racers you'll ever clap eyes on. If you were one of the wimps who got queasy from playing the original F-Zero (now updated for Game Boy Advance in F-Zero: Maximum Velocity), wait until you play F-Zero X! Part of the reason F-Zero X plays so well is the game's consistently fast frame rate. Even with 30 hover cars jostling for pole position on-screen, there's never a hint of slow-down. Four-player split screen is perhaps the most addictive multiplayer race ever, again with no sign of syrupy frame rates. Supports 4 players. 4 players can play simultaneously. If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

US.name: F-Zero™ X
US.description: Choose from 30 different hover-car racers, including updated versions of the Blue Falcon and other vehicles from the original F-Zero, and get ready to play one of the fastest racers ever! Race to the finish line on tracks that twist and turn through the air. However, you will have to avoid the other 29 cars on the track or else face the consequences! If you're in a competitive mood, try to win a Grand Prix Cup, get the fastest lap time in a Time Trial, or destroy the competition in a Death Race. You can also challenge three friends in the Versus mode. With five separate play modes, hidden vehicles and courses, and an excellent sound track, F-Zero X still represents one of the best racing titles to date!
